code: import React from'react';import"./Login.css";import{Button}from'@material-ui/core';import{auth,provider}from'./firebase';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{login}from'./features/userSlice';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var signIn=function signIn(){auth.signInWithPopup(provider).then(function(_ref){var user=_ref.user;dispatch(login({displayName:user.displayName,email:user.email,photoUrl:user.photoURL}));}).catch(function(error){return alert(error.message);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login__container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://logos-world.net/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Gmail-Logo.png",alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"primary",onClick:signIn,children:"Login"})]})});}export default Login;
